review.text: How would you rate this app in terms of general likeability?
How often would you use this application on a weekly basis?
answers: 5 - Often, at least once a day

review.text: How would you rate this app in term of ease of use?
How comfortable would you feel entering information on this app?
How would you rate this application in terms of trustworthiness?
How likely are you to recommend using this app to others (friends, family, classmates, co­workers, etc.)?

surveyA.text: Please check off all of the mobile devices that you currently use for mobile applications.
answers: I do not currently use a mobile device for mobile applications

surveyA.text: How many applications do you currently have downloaded on your mobile device?
How comfortable do you feel using mobile applications in general?
On average, how many hours per week do you spend using mobile applications on your device?
Please select all applicable categories of applications that you have installed on your device:

Please rank the following types of applications based on your current usage, from most frequently used to least frequently used. (1= Most frequently used , 8=least frequently used, N/A=Not applicable)

Please rank the following types of applications based on the amount of personal information required for use (1= Most personal information required, 8 =least personal information required, N/A=not applicable)

For the apps currently installed on your device that require creation of a user account, please indicate how many applications had an option to create a user profile for you through information sourced from another application or website (e.g. Facebook or Google+ API).
Of the applications that you use the most frequently on your device, please indicate the state that best represents how you create user profiles on those applications
answers: I create user accounts through the use of a social networking API on my most frequently used applications.
I create user accounts through manual entry on my most frequently used applications.
I am not sure how frequently I create a user account through manual entry compared to the use of a social networking API for my most frequently used applications.
I do not use any applications that require creating a user account.
I do not use any mobile applications.

surveyA.text: Please rank the following methods of user profile creation on mobile applications based on your comfort level (1= Not comfortable at all, 4=very comfortable, N/A=Not applicable)
answers: Creating a user profile with only manual entry
Creating a user profile with a combination of manual entry for some types of personal information, and the use of a social networking API for other types of information
Creating a user profile with the option of either only manual entry or the use of a social networking API, but not both
Creating a user profile with only the use of a social networking API

surveyA.text: Please rank the following methods of interactions with other users on mobile interactions based on your comfort level (1= Not comfortable at all, 5=very comfortable, N/A=Not applicable)
answers: Other users can view all of my user profile information
Other users can view all of my user profile information and other networks I may have used to transfer information (e.g social networking API) for my user profile creation
Other users can view only some parts of my user profile based on who I select to view my profile, but all users can view any other networks I may have used to transfer information

Other users can view only some parts of my user profile based on who I select to view my profile, and cannot view any other networks I may have used to transfer information I may have used to transfer information (e.g social networking API) for my user profile creation
Other users cannot view any parts of my user profile in any circumstances, and cannot view any other networks that I am a part of outside of the application

surveyA.text: Do you currently use a smartphone device at least once a day? Please select one.
How many hours do you use the Internet a day?
What device do you use most to access the Internet (for any activity, including online shopping, social media, email, browsing, etc)?

surveyB.text: How secure do you feel when using mobile applications currently installed on your phone?

Some websites and applications may require you to provide personal information through registration before continuing use. Please indicate how often you enter false information when asked to register for a website or mobile application.
answers: 100% of the time; I alway provide false information when asked to register.
I have never registered with a website or mobile application.

surveyB.text: If a website or mobile application records your activity without your knowledge, how does discovery of the monitoring make you feel?
answers: No difference in feelings of security

surveyB.text: If a website or mobile application records your activity after you have given your consent to be recorded, how does knowledge of the monitoring make you feel?
answers: No difference in feelings of security

surveyB.text: Please rate the following reasons for not providing information in a mobile application (0= Not important, 5=Very important, N/A=Not applicable)
answers: I am worried about my information getting stolen
I don't know how my information will be used in the mobile application
I don't know who else is looking at my information
I don't trust the website/application to keep my information from other people/parties
I'm unfamiliar with how the technology of the application
My information has been leaked in the past
I know of someone whose information has been exposed through a mobile application

surveyB.text: Please rate the importance of your consent in the following online activity scenarios (0= Not important, 5=Very important, N/A=Not applicable)
answers: Making a purchase or transferring money through an application
Having your personal information share with others outside of an application
Having your your activity within an application monitored
Having in­depth personal information gathered by an application from external databases
Customization of your user experience in an application through gathering of in­depth personal information that you manually enter

surveyB.text: Please rate your willingness to disclose each of the following types of information on a mobile application after receiving confirmation that your information would not be shared with other application users or external parties (0= Not willing, 5=Very willing, N/A=Not applicable)
answers: Feelings of stress, anxiety, or depression

surveyB.text: Please rate your willingness to disclose each of the following types of information on a mobile application without receiving confirmation that your information would not be shared with other application users or external parties (0= Not willing, 5=Very willing, N/A=Not applicable)
answers: Feelings of stress, anxiety, or depression

surveyB.text: Please rate your willingness to disclose each of the following types of information on a mobile application if you were given the option of choosing who could access your information. In this scenario, you would be able to disclose any of the following types of information to some, all, or none of the users of an application or external parties (0= Not willing, 5=Very willing, N/A=Not applicable)
answers: Feelings of stress, anxiety, or depression

surveyB.text: Do you use any of the following?
answers: I do not know what these are or do not use them

surveyB.text: Are you concerned about being tracked online?
I do not give much thought to if third parties, developers and advertisers on sites and apps that I use have access to my data.
Do you ever enter inaccurate information into sites and apps to keep your information private (e.g. fake age, birth year, etc)?
answers: No, I do not do this

answers: Native American, Alaskan, Hawaiian, Pacific Islander
